sen.j: 藤原 基通（ふじわら の もとみち、生没年不詳）は平安時代後期の陸奥国の在庁官人。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Motomichi (year of birth and death unknown) was a local government officer in Mutsu Province who lived during the later Heian period.

sen.j: 延久2年（1070年）に後三条天皇の勅命により始まった延久蝦夷合戦で、陸奥国司源頼俊が出陣中に、国司の印と国の正倉の鍵を奪い、逃走する。
sen.e: During the Battle of Enkyu Ezo, which began in 1070 by Imperial order of Emperor Gosanjo, he stole the seal of the governor and the key of the provincial shoso (public repository) and ran away from the province while MINAMOTO no Yoritoshi, the Governor of Mutsu Province, was away from the province to go into battle.

sen.e: Subsequently, he visited MINAMOTO no Yoshiie, who was the Governor of Shimotsuke Province, and he was arrested in Shimotsuke Province.

sen.j: 義家はこれを都に報告し、頼俊の罷免召還を要求する。
sen.e: Yoshiie reported this incident to the central government, and he requested a dismissal and a recall of Yoritoshi.

sen.j: 頼俊はこの事件が原因で事実上失脚し、副将格の清原貞衡（清原真衡）が鎮守府将軍に任ぜられたのと対照的に延久蝦夷合戦の功を全く認められなかった。
sen.e: This incident made Yoritoshi lose his position, and his military service at the Battle of Enkyo Ezo was not appreciated at all, although KIYOHARA no Sadahira (also known as KIYOHARA no Sanehira), who was the second-in-command of Yoritoshi's army, was appointed to be the Chinju-fu Shogun (Commander-in-Chief of the Defense of the North).

sen.j: 基通の出自、系譜については全く不明であるが、国司の印や国の正倉の鍵に近づけ、史料に散位と記載されていることから、在庁官人であると見られている。
sen.e: Motomichi's family background and family lineage are still entirely unknown, but it has been thought that he was a local government officer because he had access to the governor's seal and the key of the provincial shoso, and additionally, some historical materials say he was a sani.

sen.j: また、不自然に下野まで逃亡し、源義家に投降していることから、前九年の役で源頼義、義家と主従関係を結んでいた可能性も指摘されている。
sen.e: Also, as he unnaturally ran away to Shimotsuke Province and surrendered to MINAMOTO no Yoshiie, some people think he was possibly in the relationship of lord and vassal with MINAMOTO no Yoriyoshi and Yoshiie at the Zen Kunen no Eki (Former Nine Years' Campaign).

sen.j: 陸奥に源頼俊が勢力を植えつけることを快く思わない義家の意を受け、頼俊の失脚を狙い事件を起したと見られている。
sen.e: They think Motomichi started this incident in compliance with Yoshiie's thoughts in order that Yoritoshi would lose his position and power, because Yoshiie did not like the spread of MINAMOTO no Yoritoshi's influence in Mutsu Province.
